Question
========

Abby, Deborah, Sam, Tonya and Roberto work at a company. This year there is a conference in Paris. Two of the five get to go to it. How many possible combinations (groups) can go to Paris?

Answerlist
----------

* 5
* 8
* 10
* 25
* 120

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 5: Incorrect
* 8: Incorrect
* 10: Correct
* 25: Incorrect
* 120: Incorrect
